title: I forgot my PBE account or I have no qualification...
body:
I fill my account username and password, the system told cannot find my information.
So I'm wondering if I have no qualification or I just forget my account...

replies.body:
It looks like you've applied for PBE access with your current account, but I was unable to find a PBE account associated with your current account. If you're unsure if you have another account tied to a PBE account, you can use our [**PBE Username Recovery**](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/forgot-username) page to have any registered PBE usernames emailed to you.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

I think you are correct that I do applied for PBE access with this account. I think its already three month ago, somewhere around which players can text the new client. So do I have to reapply for the PBE account or just need to register a PBE account?

You haven't been accepted for PBE Access yet, so it's just a waiting game now. Basically what happens is your application is reviewed and if you end up meeting the criteria that our team needs for testing new content, you'll be sent an invite via email. Continuing to actively play League while keeping a positive attitude in-game are the best thing you could do while waiting.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
